articles.description: The object poses no danger to Earth but will come close to both Jupiter and Venus.
articles.content:
A massive comet traveling through the solar system is much larger than previously thought and could be a remnant of alien technology, a scientist claims in a new report.

articles.author: Emily Mullin
articles.title: Scientists Made Human Eggs From Skin Cells and Used Them to Form Embryos - WIRED
articles.description: The embryos weren’t used to try to establish a pregnancy, but the researchers behind the technique say it could one day be used to address infertility.
articles.content: Mitinori Saitou at Kyoto University first documented in 2018 how his team turned human blood cells into stem cells, which they then transformed into human eggs, but they were too immature to be ferti… [+2132 chars]
